name: girlishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is considered typical of a girl: She giggled girlishly. His mother was girlishly excited. See
girlish
More examplesFewer examplesShe put her head girlishly on one side.He was good looking but almost girlishly slight of build.She sat on a chair, girlishly swinging her legs.
